lines.text: Let's say 30 feet in front of the group with one of my Dancing Lights about ten feet behind her-- him? Him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Him. It's your pet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, so who's going up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everybody.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But who's going to be downstairs to--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we've got to figure out what we--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's all right. Jester drew it, I remember it, we're good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marching order heading upstairs?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take the front.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll take second position.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take third.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll take back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, it emerges into a fairly wide square-looking chamber.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Looking for dangerous shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Frumpkin emerges and looks inside. It's a Baroque-style grand chamber, with intricate designs and a beautiful interior. The floor itself is solid marble squares that are off-color to each other and give almost a checkered pattern to it. Against each wall, the walls are carved to be beautifully intricate with half-pillars carved out of them, and parts that are inset with art pieces once were set, but are gone. There are shelves in places in here, where things of worth were once set but have already been taken. The opposite side of the room, by the way, has completely fallen in. This chamber should be about 80 feet across, but it looks like something has happened and caused it to collapse inward, and the chamber is slightly tilted to one side. There's a slight tilt, a decline towards the left-hand side of the chamber. There are two load-bearing pillars that mark the center of the chamber that lead up to the ceiling, and the ceiling itself is about 30 feet up, similar height to the previous chamber you were in. Make a perception check for Frumpkin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For me through Frumpkin is terrible. Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the low light in the chamber, it's hard to make out any of specific details beyond that, but this is what you can see. The collapsed opposite side of the chamber that has fallen in, and there is rubble and stone and earth that has filled the opposite side of the chamber. There is the nice marble floor and the designs and carvings in the sides of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there any sort of door at the top of the stairs that leads into this chamber, or is it just open?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It just opens up. The spiral staircase just emerges into that chamber.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Knowing distance, space, the direction of north at all times, with Frumpkin in there, am I able to tell how far back we are from this chamber? We're 20 feet back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are about 15, 20 feet behind Frumpkin, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you say that Detect Magic is still cooking at this point? Are we still under the ten minutes from when I cast in the other room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're getting close to the tip of it-- to the end of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Am I sensing anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (snickers)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just the tip of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to scooch-- well, no, I'm with Beau, so I'm asking if I sense anything of arcane nature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing in the vicinity of the spiral staircase, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A retroactive question-- no, never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to pop a healing potion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I can help you. You want me to heal you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, I don't want to impose, but I'm bleeding profusely.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Cure Wounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Level one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She cast it on me, too?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did it on you, too. So that's seven points of healing for you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Tight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points for Nott? Okay, cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that help?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It helps.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Still 11 down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you guys staying in the staircase or are you emerging into the chamber?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm walking in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you all begin to make your way inside this chamber.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Anything arcane before it dips out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing arcane in nature that catches your attention immediately in a 30 foot distance. Are you heading into the chamber?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. I'm behind Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Behind Beau, at the entrance way, you don't feel any arcane presence. The rest of you begin to push past, and make your way into the chamber. And once again you see--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Any ghosty globbies?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll looking for will-o'-wisps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'd be perception checks from both you guys. With Yasha's torch and the globes you have there, you don't have disadvantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm dropping Frumpkin vision.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! That's real good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20. You?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're also good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you notice a couple things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One, there is a relief in the center of the chamber, right before the wall collapse covers the floor built into the marble. It resembles two faces and one body in the center. Like one torso leads into two faces that look upward. Their eyes are gone, there's circular empty sockets where the faces are and their emotionless expressions looking upward. Very thinly carved into the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Looking from above you can see it, but looking from the side it looks very strange because it's a very flat carving. You see that in the center, ahead in the chamber.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Are they like profiles, or are they front?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, they're looking straight up. There's two sockets to each, and they're empty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Looking up, deadless? Okay. Copy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Deadless?

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Lifeless

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Deadless. Deadlifts, yes, they're looking up from the deadlifts, it's--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry. Absorbing a lot at once. Keep going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see two upside down acorn-style alcoves that are mirroring each other on each side of the chamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that look like that shape?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking above you, you do see a set of chains that are hanging from the ceiling that appear to be affixed to some sort of red clay urn or vase that is dangling above.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I relay all of that, of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking across the way in the rubble, because you rolled a natural 20, you see a faint glimmer of something metallic that catches the light of the torch occasionally as Yasha moves back and forth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You point that out as well?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Off of her first comment I would send one of the globules floating up to the ceiling to better illuminate what she's pointed out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It looks to be some sort of vase or urn that is dangling from chains about 30 feet up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How big?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's dangling from a chain on each side. The light lifts around it to inspect and reveal its coloration.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Was that 30 feet above us? Is there any space between the ceiling and the container?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About a foot, foot and a half. There's not much distance. It's affixed to the ceiling right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we can see it-- sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, you're good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can see a closer of the dome with the symbols on them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no dome in here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, we're not there yet. Sorry. We're just up the spiral staircase.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're starting to enter the chamber, and there is no ceiling shapes or anything that resemble the previous chamber you were in. It comes to a-- there is a slight curve to where the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm assuming it's through the collapsed tunnel. Right. Okay. Got it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Something metallic in the rubble. Vase above.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, and the two alcoves in the sides, the two pillars that are load bearing in the center of the chamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want me to throw something up at the vase and try to knock it over?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. Let's see what's on the other side of the room first.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just to clarify your description. The container is being held from above?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. It is dangling from the ceiling.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Chains coming down? Or no, two chains from the ceiling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just two chains from the ceiling that are holding it in place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That feels like that might be a trap.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool. I start walking towards the other side of the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Fjord, you walk through, the relief on the ground ahead of you. And there is that weird source of metallic reflection that Beau had seen from across the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to scoot up behind Fjord and see if I can detect any arcane anything before the spell sniffs out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. In the final throes of the spell, the source of that metallic shine does give a faint, arcane, magical aura before the spell fades.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What kind was it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For that one? It would be abjuration.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to scoot around the side and see if I can peek into those holes. Those reliefs in the walls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The alcoves?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Alcoves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You head over to the side alcove. Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking inside, there is another clay urn of the same red color, that's set about a foot and a half inside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to get down on the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will inform the others.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go check out the other alcove.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other alcove also contains a similar clay--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three red urns?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whatever is under there is something of protection. Something to keep us out, or to protect something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you approach, you can see, buried in some of the rubble, a long brass or bronze rod of some kind. You only see about a foot of it sticking out from under the rubble.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ayyyy. There's a rod.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: About a half inch in diameter, would you call it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like it would be about a half inch in diameter, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What was underneath the urn in the ceiling? On the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the ground? There's nothing directly below it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where are the faces on the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You walk up to the faces?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go over and sit over it, and you can see a well carved, robed figure. Male on one side and female on the other, but the same features. Like two sides of the same coin. Similar hairstyle. No coloration to it, but a white marble relief on the ground. The torsos merge and extend on the two sides, and they both sort of look up with the emotionless face. And where the eyes are they are vacant, circular holes about that big.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh. All of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you get closer and look, where the holes are vacant, its only about maybe a quarter inch deep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So they don't go fully below, they're like a quarter of an inch deep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I stick something in these eyes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is there any way to see what is in the urns? Like just have a peeksies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You come towards the urn. You have to pull it out slightly to look into it because the interior is too hard to see from this point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to get my crossbow ready to fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I just, with my sword, just a little.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's only about halfway full. Make a perception check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Uh-oh. Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All you see is ash inside the urn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think it's trash.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: These are trash urns?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why would they put trash urns in these weird--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's garbage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I try and move some of the rubble off of the bronze rod?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, start shifting some of the rock. Make a strength check. This would be athletics to do this. Athletics, sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. I think that's a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You start shifting and pull the rocks off. The rod begins to coil. You start moving it and you pull and manage to pull it free from the stone. Some of the rocks falling down and stumbling to the side. You pull out a four and a half foot long rod that is straight towards the bottom for about a foot and then is in a tight coil to the very top where there is a small metallic knob at the very top. You pull it forth and it vibrates a little from the impact of pulling it out from under the stone, and then it comes to still in your hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does it wobble?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little bit, very faintly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does it make any noise?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I swing it harder, does it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't break it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You start swinging it. It makes a (air whipping) sound as you swing it around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think I would have noticed that the circus bouncer looking in the urn did not get blown up, but also looked a little puzzled. So I'm going to go over and take a look at the same thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a look at the other one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you go to look in the other urn, you glance over at the urn that Yasha was turned away from, and you see this glowing fire emerge from the urn in her direction. Just this small, glowing orb begin to shift out of the urn right towards her back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I ready to fire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are. You get to make an attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start with one of my blades.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to shoot a crossbow bolt at that fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh shit. And that is a 19 against you Yasha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Wait. Yeah, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, do your damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Is this sneak attack or no? I don't even know what this creature is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yasha is right next to it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do I get a saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No saving throw, but you do take 13 points of lightning damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to die.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I deal 16 points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, do you double it because it's a critical?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The dice are doubled. Not your modifiers, but the dice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow. Okay. That's 28 points of damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 points of damage. All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All the dice are doubled?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you actually take no damage, because he was holding his reaction and as soon as it emerges, he fires. You watch as the orb dissipates. The faint, little motes of energy shift and vanish on the outside of the urn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm looking at the other urn. Is anything happening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as another one begins to slowly emerge and another begins to emerge from the ceiling. I need you all roll initiative.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here we go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (shouting) No time to thank me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (shouting) No! No time!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, really?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got another one for 826LA.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is the worst initiative ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got Yasha off to this side, going this way. Nott, you're not too far from there. Molly, you were off to the opposite side to look to the other edge. Caleb, where were you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was where Yasha was. I went over to look at her urn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, you were over by where you found the object. Frumpkin was-- ?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin would have been just 15 feet into the chamber.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. And then Beau and Jester, where are you placed?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would be probably be in between Fjord and Caleb.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was wherever those bodies where, because I was kneeling down and looking at them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. So that would be this relief right here, by Fjord's. All righty. And you watch as Molly-- actually Molly was making his way over there as this happened. And that one emerged.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It look like lightning corn on the cob.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another one shifts out of the urn that you just had one emerge from.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's my own urn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That Nott has destroyed. It dissipated, then the small motes (fwoosh) back into the urn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! It's like never ending.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Now that I know it's there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not a surprise, at least.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Not a surprise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, going for initiative here folks. 25 to 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, 20 to fifteen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. We got Fjord. All righty. 15 to ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester and Yasha. All righty. Ten to five?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Rolled one, which makes me a two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I love it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, the will-o'-wisps rolled a 26 for initiative.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These are the will-o'-wisps?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is where we walked in from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. That is the entrance where you walked in from.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Little shits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So for their turn they vanish temporarily.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They vanish. They're gone. They're fucking ghosts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aren't will-o'-wisps like kids? Aren't they the spirits of children?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that true?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that true? Oh god, that is awful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what I learned in Quest for Glory: Shadows of Darkness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would know this, but it's different from story to story. It's not necessarily the case here. So the three will-o'-wisps come back into visual range, and one's going to be attacking Molly, one against Nott, and one against Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Copy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one against Beau is going to be-- that's a nine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nein

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a miss on you. It goes wide. There's going to be one attacking you, Molly. That is going to be an 18 to hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is eight points of lightning damage against you. Against you, Nott-- that is a 22 to hit. You take 12 points of lightning damage. As these will-o'-wisps reach out and strike you, there's a burst of energy as electricity, strangely, like undead, life-sucking energy, electricity begins to shoot through your body. You feel your muscles tense, your teeth and your jaw clench. And you break away and regain composure for a moment, but they seriously hurt you with a brief gliding by your essence. For the rest of their movement, this one is going to shift around this way. This one is going to go ahead and shift this way. This one is going to go ahead and move right there, to melee move Fjord. All right, first up we have Nott and Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. You want to go first, girl?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is the one near Molly engaged with Molly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not good, 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12? Does not hit, unfortunately. You fire towards and it (swooshing sound) just dodges out of the way, completely avoids the bolt, as it ricochets off the stonework in the distance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cocking sound) Fire again, bonus action! Not much better. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. It manages to arc out of the way of the other one. Both bolts go wide from where its position is, striking the stone. No effect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 15 didn't hit them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 15 didn't? Did you try to shoot it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Twice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, are you going to move or stay there for your turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm engaged, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to say, (shouting) Help me! I'm going to die, I'm going to die!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, while this is happening, what are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, seeing Nott have a hard time, I'm going to pull out that holy water and I'm going to, like a confetti popper, I want to, right over its face, just break it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one right in front of you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, go ahead and roll an attack with that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just straight attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It should be with your dexterity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With my dex, to throw it even though I'm not throwing it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you throwing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not throwing--the holy water. I'm trying to break it with my hand and palm in its face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not proficient with it, but it's still your dex to hit with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A 12? Okay, that-- pulling out a book here, thank you for your patience, (singing) holy water.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it a dex saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a ranged attack against the target creature. Yeah, no. You try to smash it, but it ducks out of the way. Because you're smashing it, it doesn't hit the ground and shatter, so you still have it your hand. But you swing with it to try to break it over this entity, and it dodges out of the way. They are very quick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Do I still get my bonus attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because it was a ranged attack, sure. It's stretching it a little bit, but I will let it happen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 19. 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 does hit. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of damage for that one. Nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I punch a ghost?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do hit it, but it doesn't take as much damage as you would expect. As you swing toward it, it gives resistance to your fist, and numbs it as you punch through it. It does react to the impact, but it's not quite as impactful as you hoped a swing that strong should have been.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You punched cotton candy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did, kind of-- stinging cotton candy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A little cold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does that finish your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Finishing Beau and Nott's go-- Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got a question. You said ten minutes on the boat as we were moving forward, ten minutes for him to cast detect magic, and another ten minutes for detect magic to run out, so it's been about a half an hour?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say with searching around everything, it's been closer to 45 minutes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, great. So my Armor of Agathys is still up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your armor is still up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So can I bonus-action Hex the glob-- the wispy thing right next to me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. There we go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've hexed it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great. Can I take swipe at it with the Wastehunter Blade?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wastehunter!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wastehunter. That is 15 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 to hit. You Hex it and as you swing your blade, (swooshing sound) it shimmies out of the way. Its light moves with sudden, rapid haste as soon as you try to strike towards it and dodges the blow entirely.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow! Can I use all of my 30 foot walking speed to run towards the door there where we came out of.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Ten, 15, 20, 25, 30. The one that was near you is going to go ahead and make an opportunity strike against you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does that mean I get to make an opportunity strike against it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It made an attack that doesn't include you, so yeah, technically.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is the plan here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that is an 18 to hit you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And it take ten points of cold damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you take ten points of lightning damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beautiful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's okay, that's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cold damage, all right. So it takes-- the cold does not seem to impact it as heavily as you would assume. It does hurt it, but it seems to be resistant from a lot of the forms of attacks that you are throwing in its direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Another eight points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Using your Sentinel feat to get your reaction hit off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got that gold rod, by the way. I'm getting the fuck out of here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Fjord's turn. Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. As a bonus action, I'm going to cast Sanctuary on Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I feel so safe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's concentration or not?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't say concentration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I'll pull it up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't have that on the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sanctuary is not concentration.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They have to make a wisdom save if they attack her. Then as an action, I'm going to use my cantrip of Sacred Flame.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against which one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The one next to Molly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next to Molly. That's a wisdom save?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's a dex save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 23.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It definitely saves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It ducks out of the way before the Sacred Flame bursts into the air, hitting nothing. You get the sense through all these attacks that these things are very quick. That end your turn, Jester? That brings us to Yasha.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, Yasha! Hurt them with your strength!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to get a little closer to the one that's near Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With your greatsword--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Pulled out, so I would like to rage. You can use reckless while you're raging?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Reckless attacks? Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which means you roll with advantage, but they get advantage on you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, that's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Fuck you, I won't do what you tell me!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want to get this all figured out so we won't always have question time. Can I also use Divine Fury?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Divine Fury? Yeah, that's part of your thing, so all that happens at the same time. Your first attack every round.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So I roll twice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You roll twice, take the higher of the two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go for that natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 definitely hits. You do the damage from your sword.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ah! What do I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The greatsword is 2d6 plus your strength modifier, which is three? Plus your rage modifier, which is two? That's plus five to whatever you roll, plus your Divine Fury damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fucking muscle wizards.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Plus what? Say again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatever you roll, plus five. Ten, plus your Divine Fury.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Which is another d6, plus half--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just pull out another d6.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't want to. (counting) 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, how much radiant damage is that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus half your barbarian level?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She rolled six.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The damage that I chose was necrotic. Six plus half my barbarian level, which would be two, so 18 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rush forward, rage, giant swing down with your blade. You watch this burst of dark necrotic energy come crackling out of the blow. It hits, and you watch as it flickers for a second, and pulls itself back together. It's wounded, but it seems to be shrugging off some of the impact barely. You want to stay where you are?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Bonus attack? Not bonus, but do I have a bonus? Can I do Healing Hands on Nott?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You bonus raged, unfortunately.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, that's your bonus. Copy that. Got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your turn, Yasha?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yep, that's my turn. Wait-- yes, I'm going to stay there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know what these things are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I understand what's happening, with why they're going back to the pots, to whatever's in the pots?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not entirely certain, but you do notice, glancing about, that they seem to be emerging from them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm actively tracking these at this point, I would imagine, so I can't be surprised anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Can I scoot around the-- I assume the clay pot is on the other side of that will-o'-wisp right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to scoot around to that side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take my first shot at the will-o'-wisp as I'm dancing around it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. You swing wide with your first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, let's see if this hits. 17?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 does not hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My god, really?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You swing your blade and it ducks out of the way. These are quick little fuckers!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take my bonus action, and I'm going to break the pot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Swing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taliesin hates pot!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, I do. 11 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 is enough. It's a stationary object. So roll damage on it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, that's eight points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of damage. You bring the blade in and strike into the alcove, and as you yank it out with the blade, you cut it halfway through the air. The actual urn bisects, sending ash clouding into the air around you, and you watch as the will-o'-wisp (pfft).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Why don't we do that with all of them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nice! That's what we do!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice, dude, nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The urn clatters to the ground. The top of it breaks, the second half hits with a heavy thud sound that's different from the sound of the clay that shatters on the ground. That finishes your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Other than that I'm going to take a look at it down below, to see if there's anything in there that's weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say you have to wait until next round. You reach around and finish that whirling dervish action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I should have thrown something at the vase!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb does what that bearded dude in the GIF does, going-- seeing that happen, and I cast Scorching Ray myself, and I will send one ball of fire at the next pot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The one on the roof?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, the other one besides that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one in this alcove there that's right across the way?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. That is-- oh, jeez. Everything changed for me. So that is perception plus-- not perception. Intelligence modifier, which is five plus seven. So that is an 18 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 hits, yeah. Roll damage on that one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, that's 2d6 for a damage of seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven. That urn explodes on the inside of the alcove as the streaking, hot Scorching Ray slams into the clay, causing the top half of it to detonate. The bottom half of the clay cracks, and the bottom still remains in place, the ash clouding out of it. The one--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So that did not get destroyed, then, it got damaged?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This will-o'-wisp flickers out. It had been heavily damaged already, and that amount of scattering of the ash caused it to flicker and disintegrate. The bottom of the urn is still holding itself in place, the top half scattered and broken.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was just one, so I continue to wrap my hand around, and a second one shoots out at the one in the ceiling. That is a natural 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Roll damage on that one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. That is an eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight? It shatters and breaks. The ash comes clouding down like the slight drizzle of soft dust and ash. This will-o'-wisp vanishes into the space.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ugh, it's in my eyebrows!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The other one shoots up in the air and lands two feet behind me, just goes (explosion).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa, so cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're three-point landing there, Caleb--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm standing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Standing, but hurling a-- (laughter) As you stand there, the explosion behind from the Scorching Ray, as the bottom half of the urn from the ceiling-- (tinging, rolling)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh shit, that's hot!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was amazing!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to pick up the bottom half of that, and I'm going to examine, immediately, what I've got.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, and welcome back everybody! Glad we can join... us. Before we get back into the story, we have a winner. The winner for tonight's giveaway is TheMostJost!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: TheMostJost!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The brief burst of adrenaline has begun to fade from your bodies, your muscles tense, slowly beginning to relax. The urn shattered, the chamber now still and quiet. No seeming flickering flame of undead energy or source in the vicinity. What do you want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those guys were so stupid. They could have broken the vases. How dumb are they?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know. I don't feel so bad for making fun of them now. I feel like maybe we were hard on them, but now I don't think we were.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I don't think so either. They're fucking ceramic pottery pieces.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want me to try to heal you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. Again, I don't want to impose.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll try to heal you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you're offering, I'll take it, but I am

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast, at a 2nd-level, Cure Wounds, because Nott seems like she's dying.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't strain a hammy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Goddamn it! Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is that a one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One and a two.

lines.name: MATT, SAM
lines.text: Aw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could've cast it at 1st-level! Damn it! You still only got fucking seven points of fucking healing!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel guilty for having needs!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to say, Yasha, maybe?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wait, I could've just-- we could have rested and I could've used hit dice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Goddamn it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should rest right now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I dig through one of the ashes? The urn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just wasted one of my 2nd-levels y'all!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, we can keep going.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're still resting.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Still garbage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You and Molly are doing this, if I recall, before we entered the break. The base of each urn, the lower half of it, is actually a metal-lined bottom. Looking on the inside, as you scoop out the ash, (blowing) get it to empty the space, you can see, very faintly on the inside of the metal, very faint carvings matching the symbols you have seen in the previous room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which room? Let's take the piece of metal down! Wait, does each of the urns have a different one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Each of the urns has all eight symbols in it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At this point, we should be able to see the things that the very perceptive people saw, which was two faces, eyes with holes in them in the middle--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In this room?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Should we do it in this room?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are the eye holes about the size of gold coins?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roughly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take two gold coins and put them in both of the eyes on one of the faces.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the faces? Okay. You take two gold coins out, and you place them roughly, and they both fit into the eyes of one face.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll do that to the other two eyes in the other face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you place them, as soon as they occur in there, the relief opens in half and you fall. Make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Whoopsies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was not anticipating that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For the boatman.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He always gets his due.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mama, put the coins in my eyes because I sure do not believe what I am seeing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's an eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's an eight!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As he falls, I throw a piece of feather and I cast Feather Fall on him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit, that's awesome!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a reaction. What's the range on that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're fine. Fjord suddenly begins to disappear, the floor going out underneath. This looks of fear comes over his eyes as Nott barely releases the spell in time, and Fjord goes from plummeting to gently falling. You glide down, and you look down below you into the darkness. You descend ten, 15, 20--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beau hollers out: Hey, I think you figured out that puzzle!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should probably put a light in there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb doesn't say anything or move at all, but he's thoroughly impressed with Nott, by the way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Me too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 30 feet down, you see something rapidly coming up below you. Looks like a floor or a surface, though it is somewhat amorphous and jumbled that it looks hard to see any sort of shape to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are things moving?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will send two of my globules down after him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. With your low light vision, looking down below, eventually your feet land. It's soft and crunchy as your feet land. You glance down and the smell gets you immediately. It's a heavy smell of decay, of dust, and ash. You look down below and your are sunken into a pile of long-rotting clothing. Occasionally, your foot hits something that cracks, and you can see some charred bones that remain within.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Charred?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is how they clean the room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far down is that? Does everybody see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about 30-35 feet down.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to take a rope out of my bag and wrap it around a pillar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You take it and tie it off to the side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord, do you see anything cool down there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. There's a bunch of old clothes. It smells awful down here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does anybody have weapons or coins on them?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I haven't really looked. I still got this damn bronze rod with me, too, so I got to find my way out of here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll get you out. Just look for something cool, though.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I throw the torch down there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. As you--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear your name and you look up just as the torch--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You reach up and try and grab it. Catch it, (fumbling).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let it fall!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Falls in the clothes, I start burning alive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A rope?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We already have a rope down.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I put a rope down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I look around, see if there are any weapons or objects?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb is travelling down the rope that Yasha dropped.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. That's great. Natural 19. That's a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch it, swish around, holding the torch up to it, it has a brackish dark brown/black tint to it like thick sludge pond water.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would've gotten down the rope at this point, and seeing Fjord examine that, I cast Detect Magic instantly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It is definitely magical.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. What kind?

lines.name: ASHLEY, LAURA
lines.text: What kind?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm allowed to know. It's in the book.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can ask nicely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say abjuration.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's in the fucking potion, Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to identify it to find out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. I'll take some of the nice jewelry and stuff like that and the little vial. Are there any other doors or entrances or shoots?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've probably gone through about 40 or so equivalent outfits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does Detect Magic uncover anything else besides what he's already looking through?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Just the vial that he discovered.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everybody else was resting up top while--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, short rest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, can we do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you guys want to take a short rest, about an hour or so to take a moment and take a breather. Use your hit dice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, an hour.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's okay because I don't get my spells back with rests, so that's really good that I used it and everything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I appreciate it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fjord, hold that up for me so I can tell you what it is. I will spend the next 10 minutes, with Fjord sitting in front of me and me looking at it and doing the ritual.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you guys haven't taken a short rest yet. They're taking a short rest. You can go upstairs if you want to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You want to rest first or do you want me to tell you what it is now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can tell me what it is now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so 10 minutes that takes. Identify.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that is a potion of necrotic resistance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I don't have it. You have it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whenever we get done with the short rest, can Beau start peeking through and digging away at the collapsed entrance into that tunnel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make an athletics check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I sewed my thumb back on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Ten minutes pass. You guys climb back up out of the pit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys head up and join. The rest of them are going to be resting for the next 45 or so minutes. You can join them if you want them to wait for you as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd like to, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys complete a short rest as well. Go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Arcane recovery.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While you guys are finishing that up, Beau is rummaging through the rubble.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It wasn't good. Six. Slow going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You spend about 30 minutes or so, and you maybe get about two feet into the rubble, and you're not sure how far back it goes. A lot of the stones now you're getting to are now too big for you to move.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was there a little crawl space at the top that we could crawl through?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. The ceiling caved in on that side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well. It's just me and I rolled shitty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys have all taken your time to short rest--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've also discovered that Ashley has more dice than Laura, apparently.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I don't!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is this? What is this gigantic box of dice?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Listen, she has a whole duffel bag.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but she doesn't

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Listen! I like to have all my options.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is terrible.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's not all my fault.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I believe in you. This is fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She needs better organization.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I need better organization.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You got to divide them out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shall we make our way back downstairs to see what this rod does in the little hole?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought we were supposed to turn the ceiling from up here, no?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How big are the bevels, that have the relief of the 12--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're about that big in the bottom, and about a heavy bowl size.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think the corkscrew's going to stick in the hole and move the whole room or something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, the eyes were for uncovering all that death underneath our feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The ceiling is through here and it's blocked by a bunch of rubble. We can try and dig through it if we think something should be up there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we should use the stairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what are you guys doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're going to go back downstairs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can try to move some of the rubble?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've been, like small boulders. I've been (struggling).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're taking the rod, and you guys are heading downstairs?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And the bowls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Using the bowls as well. Okay. You have the three urn vases.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm--hmm. Clean them off a bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fjord, you can, of course, stick that thing in the hole in that bottom room if you want, but if you like, my man Schmidt could do it, with little risk to the rest of us. If you like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yeah. Give him a shot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We should all stand back. Better safe than sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we know which way we're turning everything now?

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN, LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, everybody knows it already.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. It seems like they know, they decided without us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But why did you decide the way that you're saying it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well look here, now that we're back peering through the doorway at this. We have this star on that corner, and if you would rotate-- we don't know what we're rotating is the thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're hoping that we'll get it to turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If the thing goes two clicks-- correct, it goes there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're saying that's the idea because there's a diamond to a diamond, and a star to a star, and a triangle of dots to that triangle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah I like the way you guys think, that sounds smart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So smart.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well I bumped up to 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that's evocation you guys, and divination, and necromancy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Edubation. It's critical.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So wait, divination, evocation, necromancy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's dead things, good things, and in-between things?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And elemental things, right? Isn't evocation--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Evocation is destruction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fire, lightning, elemental things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys descend the staircase, find your way to the base floor. You head to the hallway where you had previously disabled the traps and carefully step across each threshold without issue, they still remain disabled.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way into the central octagonal chamber. What would you like to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Schmidt is here with us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Schmidt appears, unseen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fjord, hold out your magic whatsit there. I command Fjord to give that to Schmidt, Schmidt takes it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I refuse your command and I give it to Schmidt willingly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I ask Schmidt to insert the spirally staff into the Laura Bailey hole in the center of the dais.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the rod gingerly drifts over to the center place, slips in, locks into place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Something bad might happen once we turn this, so be on guard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is true, that's why we're hanging back behind the door. Do we think we should go clockwise or counter-clockwise?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Counter-clockwise.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Schmidt, please revolve that staff counter-clockwise please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing moves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, try it clockwise then, Schmidt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing moves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, that's a lot of bollocks then.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe it's got to be a real person. Maybe you have to cast a spell that has to do with the class of magic!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got an idea. I'm going to start rocking upstairs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Rocking upstairs?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm walking upstairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to join Molly, I think someone needs to be upstairs. You guys stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly, you have the bowls right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have the bowls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau and Molly head back up the stairs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a look at that purple-- is there only one of those little purple glowing rocks that seems to be creating light?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you look going through, you see there are a few other stone cages that have been opened and left empty. That is one that has not been removed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to open it and I will-- I'm going to poke at it to see if it seems trapped or anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does not appear to be trapped.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to open it and grab the stone out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check to try and wedge it from the stone it's attached to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (grunting) It's not budging. Your lithe tiefling form is not quite sturdy enough to pull it from the stone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dance it out of there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Beau!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you punch this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got you one better. I'll shove in my staff and push against the pillar and use it as leverage, see if I can pry it open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, I'll give you that. Make a dexterity check. Finding the proper point of leverage to push on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, natural 18. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The metal actually unhinges and the stone plummets out, you catch it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You see this is like a simple-- sorry, it's like a simple tool. Sorry, I drooled a little.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that your new nickname?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Simple tool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know what? That's fair, I'll take that. That was a good one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, you did do this. I won't tell anyone, come on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was a good jab.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to put it in the room, see if anything happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No reaction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got these bowls, I'm going to put the bowls, gingerly, I'm going to put one of the bowls on one of the symbols to see what happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, which symbol?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Put it-- middle of the star.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The metal bowl sits there, the fine engravings of all the symbols on the inside of each bowl don't seem to react.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and move the bowl to match the engravings in the ceiling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you have three bowls, and each bowl contains all eight symbols in the inside, so it's hard to match them per se.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cast a spell on one of the bowls!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we try a person to use the rod first before we start wasting spells?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah okay, I'll walk up and I'll grab the rod.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're weak, shouldn't we use a strong person?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rod doesn't shift.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It doesn't move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You move it the other way and it comes out, you have to put it back in and lock it into place, but it doesn't seem to shift or move.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's the the top of the rod again? The top of that little spiral.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a small little metallic knob at the end.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to examine it, anything interesting about it? Just a small metallic knob?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best you can look at it, it doesn't have any markings on it or anything unique, it's just a solid round knob end.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like a lightning rod?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Something like that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yasha, you're strong. Why don't you go try and twist the thing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, I'll give it a try.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You spend a good two minutes shifting on the rod the opposite direction where it locks. No movement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we think we need to cast unique spells into those bowls for each of the three schools of magic? Which is what Jester said.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We heard you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (angrily) No, it's fine!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm trying to figure out, how do you cast necrotic damage on a bowl?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know, I could Inflict Wounds on it or something, or Toll the Dead on the bowl.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to Inflict Wounds on one of them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well no, I'm going to use a cantrip because it's better. So I'm going to Toll the Dead on--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is it? Evocation?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Necrotic, divination, and evocation. So I'll try to Toll the Dead on one of the bowls, the one that is sitting on the diamond.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's absorbed and there's a moment of pause before you feel (banging sound).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's do the other two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, is it turning?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a shifting of stone-- this faint slithering sound begins to fill the chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Other two! Or maybe not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not a gelatinous cube!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did we pick the form of our killer?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A gelatinous cube!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, but you did necromantic, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, if we had picked a different magic would a different monster--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe it's a trial, maybe we have to fight all of them!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We might need to do all three at the same time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (impact) (screaming)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Guys, fucking focus! Focus!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to use my boots at this point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See, this is why I shouldn't have used my spell!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No more dick jokes! Focus on the cube.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That wasn't a dick joke!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everything's a dick joke with you, Laura.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, guys. So let me pull out the gelatinous cube stat block here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a super low initiative. That is a zero initiative for the gelatinous cube. Four minus four. Initiative, 25 to 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice! Caleb coming around, finally. Then Jester. 20 to 15.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Crickets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Negative, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 to ten?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sentinel bitches!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau and Yasha. Ten to five?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know, how do you fight a gelatinous cube?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You die.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't want to!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They suck you up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I don't know how to defeat them!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it slid into the ground, it completely consumed the rod and immediately begins to move its way forward ever so slowly in your direction of the cluster group. That being the case, top of the round we have Caleb, you're first. By the way, where do you want your kitty?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin, or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Frumpkin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin can be, oh jeez, right behind me is fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. What are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use all my movement to move back towards the doorway as best I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so it makes a strength saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Number five tonight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On a failed save the target takes 2d6 bludgeoning damage, so that is a seven and it's restrained for the spell's duration. So it attacks at disadvantage and you attack at advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We attack at advantage? For how long?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is a giant, earthen cat's claw holding it on the corner.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Zero speed, or slow speed?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It can be restrained, that thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can it? By magic, maybe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, magic holds it in place.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So it's zero speed, it doesn't go anywhere?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Restrained, it's the restrained condition.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, yep, for the spell's duration.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long does the spell last?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it concentration?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, it is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't break that concentration!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This giant cat paw has grasped around and is holding the cube in place, its claws dug into it, made of earth and dirt and stone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a question, is there any light in here at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aside from the torch that Yasha has, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay so there's dim light then, from the torch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because my globules are gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, they are very gone. Well, the torch has been your main light source since you--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's correct, thank you. Okay. And then I sit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to sit on the floor?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want Frumpkin to move anywhere?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Say again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Frumpkin's still back here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin can do whatever. Frumpkin will run towards Jester and get between-- where's Nott?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott is over there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin will stand between Jester and the cube.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, that ends Caleb's turn. Jester, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is this considered a monstrosity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it is not. It is considered an ooze.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: An ooze?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jell-o!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to back up away from it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Kill the box, Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to use the Sacred Flame cantrip because I figure it's not very dextrous.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody has advantage on attack rolls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a three. What's the damage on that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a 1d8 radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six points of radiant damage. As this flame bursts at the side of it, part of it jello-wiggles for a second.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did it look like it did anything to it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looked like it hurt it maybe, but it just looks like it's a big gelatinous cube.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The radiant didn't seem to have an extra effect then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it did not.

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does that finish your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, end of Jester's turn. Beau and Yasha, you guys are up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beauyasha. Do it up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Lady.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we just slap jello?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to do a full-on--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jello shots!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, doing a full-on jello shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Moving into it to assault it? Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good, that's an 18! Plus six, so 24?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That definitely hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seven plus four, 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of damage?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You did it at advantage?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go for the 20!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'll go for the 20, in case I roll a natural 20. I did not roll a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 11 points of damage with your hit as you slam it with the side of your staff. It shivers and shakes at the impact and your staff slides through and barely emerges through the opposite side of it, seemingly closing around and reforming where the gap was carved through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it feel like I did some damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'll take my bonus and whack. Or you know what? Yeah, I'm going to whack it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you're going to punch it.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Slap that jello.

lines.name: TRAVIS, ASHLEY
lines.text: Slap-a the bass!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good! That's 21.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there something in it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, bones.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Six damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There is something in it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six damage, all right. As you sock it with your fist, it quakes. As you pull your hand back, your whole hand goes numb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All feeling is lost from almost partway down your arm, and you're like, oh, that's--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like that pins and needles thing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's a weird feeling?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, like, dead arm. It's a little dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you staying next to it or you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Back away from it. What if a tentacle comes out of it or something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's Yasha?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Your right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I go around near Frumpkin and flank it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move around--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good. That's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't step on my cat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Yasha, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to rage? I would like to rage. Well wait, maybe I don't really need to do that because we have advantage anyway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, you don't need to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's no harm in raging.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Divine Fury.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you moving in to assault it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Assault it!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to do that again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Advantage. She has advantage because--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, right. Because the--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Eight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still hits.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It still hits?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a cube!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not hard to hit. It's a giant, quivering cube. Roll damage. 2d6 plus five plus your 1d6 plus two, I think?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did she get-- oh, nevermind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 3d6 plus seven.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because it's her strength?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's more than that!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here's ten, plus five, 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 plus two for rage, three for strength, and plus two for your--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. Wait. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 points of damage. As you carve through, you actually watch a corner of it slide off and turn to sludge and water on the ground. Your blade cuts through a section of it and (wet wobbling sound).

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it hurt it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It did?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You did great!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Way to go, Yasha!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But what-- I don't see anything happening!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a big cube of sludge.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did it change shape at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's still cubic. You carved through a portion of it. All right, does that finish your turn?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to back up a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you want to back up a little bit? As you pull back a little bit, it gets one swing at you with a pseudopod. Part of it--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At disadvantage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --(sploosh) swings out at you-- yes, it does.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I hit it with Sentinel!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: LIAM, MARISHA
lines.text: At advantage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It rolled pretty well for having disadvantage. That would be a total of 16 to hit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yasha!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stupid cube!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 13 points of acid damage, as it slams into you and begins to burn the skin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does that get halved because of raging?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you strike it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Six damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six damage? All righty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. These are all my unarmed strikes, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. You punch with your other hand and now both of your hands are numb and you're like, "Ugh!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hate that feeling!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Novocaine hands?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your whole torso, Yasha, is burning, and underneath the burning pain you feel numbness under your chin and your tongue's going a little (lolling).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! Is she poisoned?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try, just for shits and giggles, I'm going to activate the ice damage on my sword. I'm going to run up-- where am I? Over there? I'm going to run up, take a swing at that corner--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you dash up to its side there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So that's 14 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 hits!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know, it's like, just in case, I will be the one to miss. And that's six plus one ice, so that's seven damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven damage, nice. You strike through and the ice crystallizes inside. As you cut through, the liquid and the moisture (shattering) leaves this--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like ballistic gel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Stuck in the inside. So that's one carved through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's my bonus to activate it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so it's your one strike.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to back off into the corner then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It already used its reaction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, so I'm using that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes Molly's round. Nott and Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ladies first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I feel so conflicted trying to hurt a cube. But I will. I will bash that cube until it explodes all over the place. Wait.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I rolled a natural 20 to attack with my hand crossbow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage on that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, yes, you have Beau.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And it's crit so double?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Double dice and then add your dexterity modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shit!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, and I'll use Fury of the Small to make it 30!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to roll a rogue

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it half your level, or is it your level?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fury of the Small. Let me look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's damage equal to your level, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
