lines.text: That's an additional four so that's 32 damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That builds, goblin?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Class features.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm pretty sure it's equal to your level.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm looking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it racial features or class features?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. I'll look it up later!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would be racial features.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For which archetype? Spellcasting, Mage Hand? Oh shit, I should've used Mage Hand before!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Remember, that's actually your archetype.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what I should be doing!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Class features.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Regardless, you did a lot of damage to it, so 32 with your level added to it, as you strike it with your crossbow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Then I will move around that way, yes, as far as possible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'll shoot again. Why not? With advantage still?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's restrained.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 18 plus a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven more points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not too bad!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nicely done!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Low-level rogue! High-level rogue, eh, but low-level rogue is sick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: High-level rogue was still pretty cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was it, like 79 points of damage you did in one round?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that was great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Nott's turn. Fjord, what are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to use my speed to run on this side of the cube closer to you, as far back against that wall as possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25. Right there. 30 will be all the way back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 30's perfect. Eldritch Blast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At advantage. That's cocked. That natural 19's not bad, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit. Roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great. Ten plus four, that's 14 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 points of damage. This thing is just getting hit with crossbow bolts and the blasts on the sides of it. It's taking damage, but it's a hardy mass of slime and gelatin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a hardy mallow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed. That finish your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, it does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, it's now the gelatinous cube's turn. It's going to attempt to break free of the large Earthen Paw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's not disadvantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just for attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be-- what save?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 15 for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a strength check. So that would be plus two, that's a 15.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gott verdammt!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, it breaks free?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I thought it was going to stay there!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Beau's right next to it. It's going to slurp you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does that mean it's not restrained?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it can still move as part of its action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Half of its movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to (squelching).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. Who's it going for?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who's it getting? My cat?! You motherfucker! (screaming and laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I'm assuming it takes like four points of damage immediately, my cat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many hit points does it have?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three? It's gone instantly!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did any of that trigger my sentinel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your cat moved aside. I did that to fuck with you. Its engulf is an action, and it already used an action to break free. But it did move over and you guys basically moved out of the way. It's now right next to both Beau and Jester.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It didn't move out of my range at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It did not. You've already used your reaction anyway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I say that it looks like that artisanal ice that you get at really classy bars, and now I'm really thirsty for like a scotch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to end its turn. That brings us to the top of the round. That is Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I believe my Cat's Paw is still in existence and would like to try to do the same shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So. (swiping) (meow) 15. It can move as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's like Bigby's Paw?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bigby's Dirty, Dirty Cat Paw?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Looking it up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Reaches for one creature it can see within five feet of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did it get five feet? It was five feet in front of it and it moved that way. It would've been right in front of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, we'll go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, so DC 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: DC 15 on what? What's the save on it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's strength.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, strength again. That's a 14 plus two, 16.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Aw, it doesn't do it. Great. I will use the rest of my movement to move another ten feet back in the hallway I'm in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Slowly backing away. As you step on that platform back there, you feel it buzz for a second, and nearby you hear this whining of metal against metal as the trap is still broken but waiting. That ends Caleb's go. Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, and it's right next to me now? Oh god! Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sings) It's right next to me now!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, I'm going to cast Toll the Dead on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Save on that is constitution?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a wisdom save!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wisdom save! That is strangely a 14.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Also 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh shit, yeah. 16 minus 2. So no effect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Balls. Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, don't you get an advant-- no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Advantage is over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then I guess I'm going to (singing) try to back away from it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Towards Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Towards Fjord? So you're going to back away here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A little further if I can, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because it probably can't move very far.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to swing at you with its pseudopod as you move out of its range. That's a natural 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bitch of a fucking marshmallow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's some good rolls in the past couple of rounds. That's going to be-- ooh! 32 points of acid damage.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's out!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm out. I'm unconscious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Was she absorbed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I rolled-- it's 3d6. Six, four, six, doubled.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is she absorbed?

lines.name: LAURA, MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It got a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not at the moment. So you are unconscious right next to--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, but she wasn't that close to him!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She tried to move away.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it hits you from behind, and the last thing you feel is numbness overtake your body as darkness clouds around your eyes and you are out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jester, like all beautiful women, succumbed to the cube.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If I die tonight, when I decided to come and play even though I'm coughing--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry. That ends Jester's turn. That brings us to Beau and Yasha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And that, I wouldn't have-- Okay. I already got my one reaction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like that was before, though, the one reaction.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm coming for her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The first one. With it being one more round, do I have a reaction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because that was happening during-- That's since your last turn. So your reaction has come back now. You don't get an attack, but now you do after this. It's your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's me and Yasha.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yasha's a healer, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, didn't you get Sentinel on it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did on the round before. I feel like I have one more round but I don't think I did. Did you, though? Because it moved out of your range!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It did, but you guys have the same initiative round. So you used your reaction on your turn last round to hit it, as she was running away, and now it's reset to this round.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But did Yasha?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha hasn't, no. Yasha ran out of range and hasn't been able to use her reaction to hit since then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, she ran out of range. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's how you got the attack on it. She ran away and it hit her, and then you got a shot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was thinking there was another round in between that. I'm going to lay into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you're staying where you are and start--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait. Wait.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Wait. Wait. Wait.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to die, you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You'll be fine!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, probably you'll die.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caleb, you already went. You're going to give it to her? Okay. Then I'll lay into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, I wanted to make sure someone was going to get Jester out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm leaving her behind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When does the cube go?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Last.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's nine points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of damage, nice. As you slap it with the side of the bo again, you watch and it buckles in places.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go ahead and do Flurry of Blows for these next two. That's a natural 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, definitely.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not great. That's 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Great, and that's seven points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're punching this thing, and you're watching it quiver and part of it is shifting and it's looking pretty damaged in spite of its size at this point in time, so well done. Yasha, what are you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, I'm going to go up to it. Get it sliced. Raging, reckless. Divine-- no, I can't do divine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, every turn you can do it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Every turn I can do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yasha!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First roll to hit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh! First roll to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage, because you went reckless.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: With advantage. Yeah, 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll again, just in case. Reckless is good because you have a double chance to critical.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Don't ever not do it, okay. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's it. 22 damage. How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that your first one?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see it being hit by Beau and it's slowly shifting its weight towards the unconscious body of Jester on the ground. You watch it expanding to start pulling her leg inward.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I take the tip of the sword, and I slowly start pushing into the middle and then (sword slicing across).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you push it all the way into the center of it, it begins to shake and quiver and begins to slowly encapsulate your arm and forearm as it rises up, and your arm is numb. You shake your head and cut out to the side, and as you do, you watch the side of it splash out, almost like popping a water balloon. The interior of it turns to liquid water and begin to spill out as it slowly deflates and liquefies across the ground, like a jellyfish beached.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I'm stepping in it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (clapping)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll tell you one thing, that restraint saved your fucking ass at the start! It never got to engulf. Never got a chance to engulf.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll run over, and I'll kneel down next to Jester, and pick up her head and pour a health potion there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Imitating Jester) Put your tusk in there, Fjord! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Oskar.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fjord.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you for saving me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's Fjord.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry, I mean Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. You all right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Get up, come on, on your feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Did we kill it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yup.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry, I think that was my fault, you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, these things happen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anything come out of the middle of that thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From the middle of it? No, it turns to liquid gel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get my cat out of there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of these days I'll get to put one of you guys in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, Frumpkin! Hey buddy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: From down the hallway you hear: Now the question is, if we do the same thing again, will another one come out? Or do we need to try to hit all three at the same time? Let me come in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, I guess I'll leave this here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Leave it nearby.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll set it aside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: LIAM; Well, Jester did necrotic, and I can obviously handle, well, I can handle evocation or--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who has divination, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you didn't notice during this process was the pillar above, the base re-closed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we have to do it all at once.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can do both divination and evocation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At the same time?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you do one of those things?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. You taught me magic. What are mine? What are my spells?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, tell me what you are able to do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here, I'll show you on D&D Beyond.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are the last two? Divination and--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Divination and evocation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does anybody have one of those?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Most of mine are illusion and something else.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you can do evocation with this one--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I can do evocation!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you have to get up there, though. You have to touch it with that one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can your mage hand lift you up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. But I can do climb!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we have to do it in the bowl.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or we do it to the rod.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To the bowl.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you handle evocation. I can handle the divination. You handle necrotic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where are the bowls placed right now? On the symbols in the center?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In the hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can do Shocking Grasp as a evocation spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait. I have an idea. Maybe we should take the bowls outside of the room and cast something on the bowls and see if one of the symbols on the bowls light up. That way, the staff doesn't absorb the spell immediately. Because when I cast Toll the Dead, I was trying to cast it on the bowl, right? But instead, my spell went up into the middle of the staff. Maybe if we try casting it on the bowls outside of the room, that won't happen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can't we cast it on the staff?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is a room outside this room where it seems like there was a room for maybe preparing the bowls?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's do that. Jester, lead the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is worth a try. Of course it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just so we don't have to fight another cube, just in case.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm pretty good. I have not let go all of my preparation for the day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many points of healing did you give me? When you poured the spell in my mouth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Was it a regular healing potion?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, just regular.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 2d4 plus two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is everyone all right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jester, how are you feeling?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm feeling like I'm a little sick right now, but you know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, not Laura but you: Jester. How are you feeling?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like I'm bleeding a little bit from my ears.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I reach into the satchel on the side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. You keep it. I'll do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I give her my potion of healing. Regular healing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, I have healing spells still. It's okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, what are you complaining about then?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wasn't bitching at all! You asked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is not the verbiage that I chose at all.

lines.name: SAM, ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wubba lubba "werbage"!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's fucking go out into this hallway, okay?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Beau and I take the bowls. We head out into the hallway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys head out past the traps, carefully stepping across the currently-held traps and you have the bowls in the far hallway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we try casting a spell on one of the bowls and see what happens?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. We lay all three of them, one, two, three, out in a row.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Necro, evo, and divination all together.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Evo, you first. Pick a bowl.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, no. We have to do it instantaneously.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we don't. I don't think so because we're not in the room anymore so we can try to see if the bowls do anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you think it would hurt if we did it at the same time?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, what's the problem with that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure, try it. We'll see what happens.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's do it at the same time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At the count of

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beau takes off her belt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast my Spare the Dying cantrip.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Necromancy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Necromancy. You're casting?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shocking Grasp.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Which is evocation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Identify, which is divination.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (silence)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're waiting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Three, two, one. (swishing)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gibberish)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all cast your spells. No effect on the bowls.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have to be in the room!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to see because there's still the ash caked on the inside of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait. I blow on the bowl. Does it look like any of the symbols got any brighter?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would say the one that I had I probably polished up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's very hard to see with very little light in here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. That was good. We checked that box, so let's go back into the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's good. It's 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20? Very good. There is something bugging you in the back of your head. Something that says the fact that these were urns that carried ash speaks to the purpose of these. You can't make the connection here, but the fact that each of these were filled with ash is bugging you. There's something there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The urns, currently, are totally empty?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're totally empty, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we cast it on the rod?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know. I--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we need to set these on fire?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We maybe need to go upstairs and scoop some of the dustbuster bullshit into these and bring them down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott, you want to go cast it on the rod? Let's go. You and me, we'll do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You need three spells.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm saying we need to go collect some of the ashes of the dead from upstairs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or maybe we need to set them on fire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Something is missing here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to set it on fire?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, are they already filled with ash? Right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ash has been mostly cleaned out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still have this holy water, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you have your torch, and you have your spells.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's possible that we need to burn something afresh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold the torch under one of the bowls.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I can set things on fire as well. Do you want to do one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just hold it under and see what happens.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's easier. I cast Firebolt into one of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cast Firebolt into one of them. The flame bursts in there as you guys take the torch over to the side. As the fire subsides, you see each of the symbols, portions of them are left glowing and slowly fade.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which ones? Which portions?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of them. All the symbols have certain parts of them that just glow for a second in the presence of fire and then fade.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold the torch under one of them for a long time and see what happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's going to hold the bowl?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll hold the bowl. I'm resistant to fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take the bowl, and you hold it out there. It hurts a little but as you hold the torch underneath, it begins to light up. You watch as the symbols begin to glow on the inside of these metal inscribed bits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Look at this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Woah! Here we go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So creepy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There we are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? Parts of the symbols are glowing more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We were wrong about what we needed to cast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we need anyone to hold anything that's dangerous--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's that one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need-- transmutation--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Illusion! We need an illusion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know those!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we need enchantment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Transmutation--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Illusion and enchantment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And enchantment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have an enchantment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have transmutation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not just a shape. See this writing in here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know an enchantment spell and an illusion spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know enchantment and transmutation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you do trans? I'll do enchant.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can transmute or something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you can?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. We'll figure out--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think it turns.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm so glad you taught me magic, Caleb.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got an idea. I think I know how it works now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know how it works, and I'm not paying any attention. I'm very drunk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is great. I think that this is a guide. We know what we need to know because of these bowls. I think we need all three of these versions of the spells placed in each of these points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We put bowls-- no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't even need the bowls.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One, two three, right there! That's where we need to spin it over there!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everybody stand at their point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait. I got to find my spell that actually does the thing that I said I could do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Right there! See? That symbol matches with this one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sarcastically) Are you sure?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I figured this out, guys! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, I have enchantment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So what do you have?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Enchantment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need transmutation and illusion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have transmutation and enchantment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have illusion and transmutation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And what do you have, Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have enchantment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you're enchantment. That means I have transmutation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm illusion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, yes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If anything starts to happen, I want you to run for the door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'll go stand by the enchantment-- under the symbol for enchantment, just in case.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would be the three dots.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about you Fjord? Don't you have some spells on you? Why aren't you helping out?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you want?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you do enchantment?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope. I got evocation. I got necrotic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If another cube or something comes out--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need fighters.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me and Fjord will stand by in case anything else drops out of the ceiling.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's right. We've got these two bruisers here. That's good. I concur.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just in case, I'm going to light my other sword too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (flames) Mark your damage on that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are we casting it upon?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we're casting it at the staff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yasha, you want to take another point? Fighters and casters?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god. I'm going to cast Armor of Agathys on myself again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we need to be standing in front of the symbol that it lines up with?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would stand in front of the symbols on the triangle, personally.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll go stand in front of the three dots.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're super uppity about this shit, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I go over next to the illusion one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I, of course, in front of transmutation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are triangulated around those specific coordinates you've set yourselves, what do you do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We count to three and we go?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're doing what? I'm doing Maximilian's Earthen Grasp again with my cat's paw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm doing Hold Person.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm taking a bit of fleece and doing some hand symbols and casting Silent Image.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You're casting--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold Person.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pull off the belt again.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sword at the ready.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One, two, three!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well done, guys!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I cast Armor of Agathys for nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still got it for an hour.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good, because who knows what else we'll run into while we're down here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On the other side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I'm wearing it. I'll run over to the door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Check for traps.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait! I sit down, and I start doing the ritual for Detect Magic again. Ten minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While he's doing that, anybody else doing anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm running over to the door. I'm not crossing the threshold. I just want to see. I got darkvision.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking inside, with what low light is coming through from the edges of Yasha's torchlight, the first thing that hits you is the smell. It's a strange combination of old decay, strong rust, and burnt hair. It's hard to describe, but it's a very unpleasant mingling of smells as it hits you. Looking inside, you see a chamber ahead divided into three smaller sections and a center main chamber area. The center main chamber area is what you can most make out the details of. It looks like some sort of inert arcane circle in the center. There's a symbol drawn there with runes around, but it's currently cold and dark. You can't see much further beyond that because you're staying at the doorway, and to the right and left it looks there's two smaller chambers immediately, and then it goes further in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got more magic stuff inside. I know Caleb's meditating, but it's going to get hairy, I bet. Smells a little burnt hair-y.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I walk up behind Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The torchlight extends into the chamber, and you can see a little more now. The two side chambers are almost pill-shaped. They're rounded at each side, and they're enclosed, but open into the center chamber. At each of these rounded edges, as you step inside and glance to the right and left, you can see cage-like contraptions: iron domes that are very tight-knit, dark iron rusted metal. They're on the edges of each side. You see load-bearing pillars in the center of the chamber to the right and left, and cold braziers behind those against the walls: little domed pieces of stone that once contained flame for light. Across the way you can see two tables with chairs, a bookcase. That's all you can see at this distance.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The dome cages are solid steel, or are they bars?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're bars, but the bars are an inch, inch and a half between each. It's very little space in between.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start heading in this direction, too. Does one of them look like it was possibly holding a gelatinous cube at some point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you entering the chamber to look?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll go with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should detect traps.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll look for traps. I know it's my job.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Five more minutes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best you can tell, there's no traps in this first portion of the chamber.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All clear. I take another swig from my flask.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. How drunk are you right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pretty drunk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll put you in the drunk status, then.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's been a long night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha, Molly, want to come in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: By the way, Yasha, can I say, you weren't even with us yesterday, and now you're down here doing this! Is this crazy? What were you doing yesterday?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was sitting in the tavern and then you guys came into the tavern.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But did you know that you'd be down here with us tonight?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, Nott, I did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How did you know that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I happen to-- no, Nott, I did not know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How and when will I die?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can't tell you that, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you know!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, of course.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's powerful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't spoil it for her. We'll find out in an hour or so anyway.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Good call, Molly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha, you enter with the torch as well? All right, the three of them enter. You guys following behind or are you staying back with Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb is super intense on his shit right now, going: I am helping the group. Everyone's going to be safe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beau's left behind going: Come on! Pick it up, Caleb!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Beau, should I use my last spell to heal myself?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a healing potion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jester, you should always look out for yourself first, all right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a healing potion if you want one, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I should cast the spell on myself?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am waiting behind, motherfucker!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take a healing potion, and I hand it to Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This seems like a waste of money. I'm trying to be smarter with my money.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, you're the worst with money.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Regular healing potion? 2d4 plus two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yay, double digits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What faint bits of candle remnants are there are mostly melted, and the wax dripping off and causing small pools in the ground, but they've been cold for some time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I go over to one of the cages.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did we wait the short amount of time for Detect Magic?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am in-between you and them, and I'm going: come on, come on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I go over to one of the cages, the nearest left one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance through with the light that's flickering through the various gaps in this iron cage, and inside you can see a similar clay urn, deep red, sitting in the center. You see burnt and tattered clothing at the sides of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh jeez. Got another urn here full of ash.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be careful!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kill it! Break it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anyone want to check the other cages? Make sure it's not the same thing in each?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll go take a look at the other cage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll go look at another one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance-- make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm hanging out with Caleb and Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You finish your ability. Your Detect Magic is now in effect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing into one of the far end cages-- What did you get, Yasha?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I got 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys hit two other cages on the right side, both the far end close edge of that platform. You're looking in the small cages. You see another urn, and you glance up and see at the very top, there's a chain of some kind that was wrapped in a noose. You see the urn that contains the ash down within, there are remnants of ash around the outside in a circle, and bits of cloth and material, and this chain noose hanging above where this urn was.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would I be insane for thinking this is how they make them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Make what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The will-o'-wisps.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The will-o'-wisps are the dead. They are left from the dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This was a factory, maybe?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Heading over to Molly, I stop in the middle of the room at that inert circle. Does it look like anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an arcana check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are we near the table at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys can move to the opposite end if you want to get closer to the table. Looking at the inert circle, it looks like-- You have an instinctual arcane knowledge that's been imparted upon you by whatever this gift has been given to you, so the knowledge comes to you. It's alien but familiar at the same time, and your brain's trying to work through this disconnect. This circle looks like it was once developed to be a teleportation circle, but has since, it seems, been scarred and closed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel like this was used to move or deliver people or things. This was a center for transportation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What the fuck are you talking about? (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we in the other room still, or did we come in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb has now finished and you guys can enter the chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sounds good, Fjord.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How close to the table can we get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How close do you want to get? There's two tables, both kitty-corner into the further chamber.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to wait for Caleb at this point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I look around the room?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you need my help?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is he done yet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give me a second to blacklight the room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're in the room. Let's go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm waiting for the narrator to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I told you, a couple times. You finished your spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, good, right. So I'm walking. Is there anyone between the bookshelf and me, where I am? Is Fjord?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, currently it looks like Jester and Yasha are in between that space.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who's the closest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're both equidistant.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk up between the two of them, and I have a 30 foot radius on the spell, so I'm basically doing this, but I'm very interested in the bookshelf obviously. I'm looking everywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there a type? I will ask that every time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, there is. And just to be consistent, here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Friendship magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is conjuration. There is a very faint magical essence, straight ahead. As you focus and lean forward, it becomes a little stronger. Above the bookshelf, there is a shape, embedded in the wall, that is emitting a slight magical aura.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In the wall, above the bookshelf?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Above the bookshelf, you don't have quite enough light, and Yasha's holding the torch that's being cut off from the roof.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got a light stone in my pocket if anyone wants to go for it. Here, hold on--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, I'll climb up on the bookshelf.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Careful!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you approach, the bookshelf is mostly empty. Similar to the first chamber you went to, it looks like either everything in here was taken or destroyed. Most of the bookshelf is plain empty with broken pieces, and tattered bits of paper, and no books present on the shelf at the moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Zero books.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That you see on the shelf as you close in to look at it. As you climb the shelf and look up, above the bookshelf there is, placed ornamentally on the wall, a very wide blade, longsword of some kind is bolted onto the wall as an ornamental display.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look trapped? Is this trapped on the wall?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want me to check it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Climb up on the bookshelf with me!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please pull it out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This can't go wrong.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I go up and check. I got a-- oh wait, disadvantage, I'm drunk. That's a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. Best you can tell, there's no trap.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I try to pull it out?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, pull it off. I'll give you all my health potions in one day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I lift, I pull, and I try to pull it off the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to trust fall her, if you will, as she falls from the top.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job not getting stabbed, you guys, because this is sharp-looking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a heavy-looking blade. The hilt of it is gold and curls up to the side. It is all these tiny runes inscribed along the edge. The central blade is

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is a sacrificial blade for sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it long?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's about six feet long.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jester's holding it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm holding it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How's the girth?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's pretty girthy. Can you identify it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I obviously can do that, and I have a little bit of reserve left, but we are still not topside yet, so we can either sit for ten minutes and I can tell you exactly what it does, or we wait until later. But I'm not willing to do this--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No more ten minutes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is ten minutes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll strap it to my back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can wait until later.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Put it in the bag.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's very sharp and the bag is easily punctured and I don't want to risk it. I'll strap it to my back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shouldn't we, for good measure, be breaking up these other ceramic--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are those ceramic pots giving anything off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tables, by the way, that are right next to the bookshelf, have writing utensils, quills on the side, one has an inkwell that has been long dried over that has a spider web attached to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it have any paper?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A natural 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't notice any paper, but as you glance underneath one of the tables, on the bottom it looks like one book has been not taken, or at least had fallen beneath and was left behind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Liam just got an erection.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I heard it! It was like (deep thud) on the table.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh come on, it's like (light thud).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, the first one was right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The book, as you pull it out, a corner of it is burned pretty heavily.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Detect Magic's still going, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where you found it, there's a bit of an ash trail that leads back towards the far wall, towards where one of the braziers is. You get the sense that maybe whatever was in here may have been thrown in the braziers to burn and this book got discarded or thrown. You open and start looking through the pages. What languages do you know?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know Common! Oh god. I don't know where to look on D&D Beyond.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Proficiencies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be under proficiencies, probably.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's not there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, it's not? Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, D&D Beyond!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Character details, under description.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Description, character details? I know Sylvan, Common, and Celestial.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not recognize this script.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I will cast Comprehend Languages.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hope that doesn't get rid of all your other spells.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It doesn't. Just one. I cast Comprehend Languages.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Reading through briefly, and it is scribblings, disjointed and broken in place. Taking a moment to look through, you get the sense this is the journal of somebody named Siff Duthar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't write that down!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because only

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm definitely going to write it down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Siff Duthar!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Siff. S-I-F-F. Duthar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The thing is, he probably won't ever tell us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He'll tell me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The pages, the ramblings speak of a coming war. They talk about foolish pawns who follow their gods to annihilation. They speak of the armies of Ghor Dranas washing over the land and pauper and kings alike being saved not at all and being placed on a pike and held like a banner into battle regardless of who they are. They speak of the weakness of flesh and the need to endure beyond the paltry life shell that we're given. It talks about experiments with refugees, finding if the soul is bound to the flesh in any form, be it ice or ash. It speaks of an obsession with avoiding the eternal hunger of The Crawling King, he who tunnels beneath the world and will find him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy. This seems like beyond our level stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there an audiobook version of this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It speaks of a bounty hunter, who had infiltrated this sanctum after Siff. And while it cost Siff his legs, the hunter was burned into the brazier, flames of erasure. A trophy shall be taken and displayed as a warning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's the sword! It's the fucking sword!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The scrawlings taking you a moment, even with the spell, to focus and make it out. Speaking on quaking within the earth around that shakes the surrounding hills and darken the sky. The betrayer gods come. The power of man must remain. The arcane gifts must bypass their punishment, show them that they are not above their creations. The final notes grow even more paranoid, worried that the secrets that Siff seeks will fall into the hands of Ghor Dranas and that all must be destroyed. All must come to ash and from the ashes, shall rise again. That's the final page before the rest of the book is charred beyond recognition.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right. I tell nobody this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just say that all again one more time, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Say it all out loud.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do read it out loud.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is hard core.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's in the urn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, "from ashes shall rise again?" Are we going to fight some guy who's going to chop off our legs?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It talked about chopping off our legs!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But then this sword belongs to the guy who came to save Siff? The bounty hunter?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, the trophy was a warning. He lost his legs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to take a look at some of these cages with the urns.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was the thing about "fire or ice," though? It was like, "fire or ice?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jester, while Molly is looking around, hold that for me. Hold it still.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold what still?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The sword, and I will tell you what it is, but you have to hold it for a while, Muscles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Something wicked this way comes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm so confused!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't have hardly any hit points!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's going to talk to us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I tried to write as much as I could.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's okay, I have one spell slot left, it's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got a 2nd-level and a 1st-level.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe we should run.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have a week to think about it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was he coming up out of the teleportation circle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys were all towards the bookshelf and the tables. It emerges from the center area near the circle, not from the center of the circle, but in that vicinity. He wasn't emerging, he wasn't teleporting in. He was rising out the ground while Molly's off by one of the cages on the side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I saw something happen in that cage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm at that other corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You and Molly are both at the other corners.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't want to wait a week!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: May I ask: What were we sent here to get again?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to say, I don't think we've achieved anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we were supposed to get rid of the orb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys were sent here to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He wanted us to bring back any type of ancient research that we could find.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just research?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But we could keep any of the spoils.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could run away, bring the book and run away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All we have to say is we cleared it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, if we want to be a little punk ass bitch about it! We got to take this guy down!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This guy is way beyond our level.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we need to do some discussion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a game of choices, guys. Figure out what your choices are for next week. On that note, well done, guys!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't want to wait a week, I want to do it right now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If it wasn't already 10:38, we could continue.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's nothing. I could go for another two hours, at least.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. But depending on what you do, could TPK real fast. No. Thank you guys so much. Thank you for watching and tuning in. Don't forget the awesomeness with 826LA.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Archer season seven?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Archer season nine, D&D Beyond, all our fantastic sponsors. Pillars of Eternity II, we're super excited about that and the new comic. Check all that stuff out. Things to hold you over until next week, at the very least.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Only cool things here. Only cool things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much for watching. Have a wonderful night and a wonderful week and is it Thursday yet? Good night!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it's not! [music]
